Subject: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

::All was quiet at the Neocon base.  Galvatron, fully healed, was plotting 
his next attack.  Then all of a sudden, a pod crashed near them.  It opened 
up and a massive(Optimal Optimus sized) robot stepped out.  One of the 
greatest Decepticon leaders ever, DEATHSAURUS!::
Galvatron: Deathsaurus? but you were destroyed by Star Saber!
Deathsaurus: Ah yes, Galvatron! My impudent successor. Do you call this hunk 
of junk a base?
Galvatron: Why yes i do!  I lead a faction known as the Neocons.  Would you 
like to join?
Deathsaurus: I've got a better idea.  We fight for leadership!
::Galvatron needed no more hints.  He took a sword out of subspace, and 
Deathsaurus followed suit. They locked swords.  After a long time, the battle 
seemed to be nearly over::
Deathsarus: You fought well(pant) Galvatron.
Galvatron: As did you.
Deathsaurus: Good bye, Galvatron........ Tigerbreast, Eaglebreast, attack!
::Tigerbreast and Eaglebreast deploy and rip Galvatron apart.  Megastorm 
sees::
Megastorm: NOOOO! I was supposed to kill him!
Deathsaurus: And i'm supposed to kill you!
::He runs at him and slices his head off.  Mech fluid everywhere, the battle 
had ended.  The Aerocons, who had been watching in horror, found that 
Deathsaurus was there new leader!
Deathsaurus:  From now on the Neocons will be led to glory and honor! under 
me!

OOC: please put Galvatron and Megastorm on the deceased list, killed by 
Deathsaurus,.
